nome: Otome Game no Hametsu Flag shika Nai Akuyaku Reijou ni Tensei shiteshimatta... OVA

metadata_completo.titulo_oficial: Otome Game no Hametsu Flag shika Nai Akuyaku Reijou ni Tensei shiteshimatta... OVA
metadata_completo.titulo_ingles: My Next Life as a Villainess: All Routes Lead to Doom! X: I Met My Destined One...
metadata_completo.sinopse:
Before they met Catarina Claes, each of her close friends struggled with their personal conflicts. But with a bright smile and a helping hand, the warmth of Catarina's friendship began to melt away the moments of their lonesome darkness.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]
